commands.name: index
commands.title: Search Books
commands.subtitle: Google Books
commands.description: Search and view Google Books from Raycast

preferences.name: apiKey
preferences.title: Google Books API Key
preferences.description: Optional API key for Google Books. Get one free at https://console.cloud.google.com/apis/credentials (enable the Books API). Without a key, requests share a global quota and may be rate-limited.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
